name: elder_spawn_02
text: It is only right that I am cast into this world, for I had a hand in breaking it.
text_simple: it is only right that i am cast into this world for i had a hand in breaking it

name: elder_spawn_04
text: I step at last onto the terrene plane.
text_simple: i step at last onto the terrene plane

name: elder_spawn_05
text: I was the hammer at the Founding.
text_simple: i was the hammer at the founding

name: elder_spawn_09
text: Those from the Founding, united at last.
text_simple: those from the founding united at last

name: elder_battlebegins_01
text: On this alone of seven planes the final war is fought.
text_simple: on this alone of seven planes the final war is fought
pretty_criteria: As the game starts|Spawning in the loadout

name: elder_battlebegins_02
text: What long ago I shattered must be rendered whole.
text_simple: what long ago i shattered must be rendered whole

name: elder_battlebegins_03
text: The battle is joined, like the pieces of a broken world.

text: May this blood run deep to heal the world's wounds.

text: You were the first to leave this plane.

text: My elder soul's infused with youthful vigor.

text: Ah, now that is much better.

name: elder_kill_01
text: Where were you when the world was young?
text_simple: where were you when the world was young

name: elder_kill_02
text: I broke the world, did you think I could not break you?
text_simple: i broke the world did you think i could not break you

name: elder_kill_04
text: You must learn respect for your elders.
text_simple: you must learn respect for your elders
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero|A master hero chat wheel was used

name: elder_kill_06
text: What was divided returns to unity.
text_simple: what was divided returns to unity

name: elder_kill_10
text: Your spirit, torn from your flesh.
text_simple: your spirit torn from your flesh

name: elder_kill_11
text: Go and find renewal at the Increate's hands.
text_simple: go and find renewal at the increates hands

name: elder_kill_13
text: Against me, all warfare is asymmetric.
text_simple: against me all warfare is asymmetric

name: elder_kill_14
text: So puny compared to a Titan.

name: elder_rival_01
text: I have reduced you to pulp.
text_simple: i have reduced you to pulp

name: elder_rival_02
text: I remember when you were but a sapling.
text_simple: i remember when you were but a sapling

name: elder_rival_03
text: I spread ashes on the Lone Druid's grave.
text_simple: i spread ashes on the lone druids grave

name: elder_rival_04
text: A dark matter is laid to rest.
text_simple: a dark matter is laid to rest

name: elder_rival_05
text: You forget your true nature, Earthshaker.
text_simple: you forget your true nature earthshaker

name: elder_rival_06
text: Shaper of continents, you have forgotten me.
text_simple: shaper of continents you have forgotten me

name: elder_rival_07
text: The stone that lives is a stone that dies.
text_simple: the stone that lives is a stone that dies

name: elder_rival_09
text: Across the Seven Planes, I have never seen your like.
text_simple: across the seven planes i have never seen your like

name: elder_rival_11
text: A strong force you were, but no match for your Elder.
text_simple: a strong force you were but no match for your elder

name: elder_rival_12
text: Child of the Schism, Io returns to Unity.
text_simple: child of the schism io returns to unity

name: elder_rival_13
text: Rejoin your kin on the Fundamental plane.
text_simple: rejoin your kin on the fundamental plane

name: elder_rival_14
text: That which I divided, returns to Unity.
text_simple: that which i divided returns to unity

text: So dies the spark of ancient suns.
text_simple: so dies the spark of ancient suns

text: Chaos Knight, a strong force you are.

name: elder_ally_03
text: Io, my old friend, we are far from your plane.

text: Sing, Io, of what Schism hath wrought upon this world.

name: elder_ally_05
text: Great age has dissolved the differences between us, Keeper.

text: Come, Druid, you are alone no more.

text: We shall mold this fight to our advantage, Earthshaker.

text: Tiny, the artisans knew not what they created in you.

name: elder_death_13
text: I should have retired ages ago.
text_simple: i should have retired ages ago

name: elder_respawn_01
text: The forge of creation casts me anew.
text_simple: the forge of creation casts me anew

name: elder_respawn_02
text: Is this a new form or the same one of old?

name: elder_respawn_03
text: The Increate has granted me another chance.

name: elder_respawn_04
text: By the Five Pillars I am shaped again to life.

name: elder_respawn_05
text: I return and my shadow comes with me.

name: elder_respawn_06
text: To wholeness and healing and a world to remake.
text_simple: to wholeness and healing and a world to remake

name: elder_respawn_07

text_simple: the fault was in the mold not in the maker

name: elder_respawn_08

text_simple: born anew yet still i am an elder
